channel.title: Filter on wroot
channel.description: Recent content in Filter on wroot

item.title: Downgrade HTTPS connections to HTTP using Ettercap filters
item.description: Ettercap is a great tool for MITM poisoning and sniffing. Everyone on Infosec should have played with it (or Cain) at least once. Man-In-The-Middle MITM attacks are pretty easy to perform on a local network but the tools tend to crash a LOT. Cain (Windows) is a little more stable than Ettercap but I prefer it over Cain because it doesn’t spoof SSL that I consider too loud depending on the attack.
